mapper.select: SELECT standardCategory as standardCategory, standardCategoryName as standardCategoryName, COUNT(standardCategory) as standardCategoryCount FROM lysoft_standardlibrary WHERE documentType='1' GROUP BY standardCategory
select MAX(standardId) from lysoft_standardlibrary WHERE standardId LIKE '91%'

#{item}
SELECT * from lysoft_standardlibrary ORDER BY effectiveDate desc
SELECT * from lysoft_standardlibrary ORDER BY browseVolume desc
